title: Heavy Armored Lady Morenette
alternative_title: Juusou Reijou Moanet;Juusou Reijou Moanette;重装令嬢モアネット
status: Juusou Reijou Moanet;Juusou Reijou Moanette;重装令嬢モアネット
description:
Description :
        "I will never marry an ugly woman!"Traumatized by her childhood fianc's words, the daughter Moanette is now in full body "armor". She spends her days alone in the forest, far from love.One day, her former fianc, the prince, and his squire, the handsome and tongue-tied knight Percival, suddenly visit her."I won't show you my true face!You piece of iron!"
